resources.string: Click on below links to know more about the city
The Vidhana Soudha located in Bengaluru, is the seat of the state legislature of Karnataka.
Lalbagh or Lalbagh Botanical Gardens, meaning The Red Garden in English, is a well-known botanical garden in southern Bengaluru, India
Cubbon Park is a landmark area of the Bengaluru city, located within the heart of the city
Innovative Film City is an amusement and theme park with go karting, and stage and studio facilities
Bangalore Palace, a palace built by Mysore wodeyar dynasty
Wonderla Holidays, is one of the largest amusement park operator in India,headquartered near Bidadi
Freedom Park is located in the Central Business District. It was formerly the Central Jail.
Nandi betta is an ancient hill fortress in southern India
Karnataka High Court is the High Court of the Indian state of Karnataka. It is located in Bangalore
Sri Radha Krishna Temple has deities of Radha and Krishna located at Rajajinagar, in North Bangalore
UB City is the biggest luxury commercial property project in Bangalore, India. Pioneered by the UB Group in Joint Venture with Prestige Group
Orion Mall is a shopping mall at Brigade Gateway Enclave in Bangalore, Karnataka, India developed by Brigade Group
Mantri Square is a shopping mall situated in the Malleswaram locality in Bangalore, Karnataka, India
The Forum is a shopping mall located on Hosur Road in Koramangala, Bangalore, Karnataka, India developed by Prestige Group
It is the largest mall in Bangalore by area, occupying 1,600,000 square feet
Park Square Mall is located within the iconic International Tech Park Bangalore (ITPB), a leading IT park in India
Garuda Mall is a premier shopping mall in the city of Bangalore, India.
Inorbit Mall is a subsidiary of the K. Raheja Corporation which runs shopping malls in various parts of India
Royal Meenakshi Mall is South Bangalore first complete mall with a hypermarket, retail, entertainment and multiplex
Vega City is one of the most awaited destinations in the south of Bengaluru.
International Tech Park (commonly called ITPL and ITPB) is a tech park located in Whitefield, Bangalore, 18 km from the city centre
The park is situated in Hebbal on Outer Ring Road, and has a building area of 8.8 million sq. ft. The park is spread over 424 acres
Bagmane Tech Park is a software technological park in India. The park is situated at CV Raman Nagar in Bangalore.
Prestige Shantiniketan is an integrated township in Whitefield, Bangalore on a total of 105 acres developed by Prestige group
It is one of India’s largest electronic industrial parks, spread over 332 acres
RMZ Ecospace Business Park was one of the first few large projects to come up on Sarjapur Outer Ring Road.
RMZ Infinity is located on Old Madras Road. It includes Google Office
Global Village Tech Park is situated in Rajarajeshwari Nagar and spread over 120 acres.
Embassy GolfLinks Business Park(or EGL) is a software centric commercial park in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.
Cessna Business Park is situated in Outer Ring Road, Bangalore
Kempegowda International Airport is an international airport serving Bangalore, the capital of the Indian state of Karnataka
Bangalore Metropolitan Transport Corporation (BMTC) is a government agency that operates the public transport bus service in Bangalore
Namma Metro , also known as Bengaluru Metro is a metro system serving the city of Bengaluru
The Karnataka State Road Transport Corporation is a state-owned road transportation company in the state of Karnataka
Indian Railways (IR) is Indian national railway system operated by the Ministry of Railways
Ola, is an Indian origin online transportation network company.Now based in Bangalore
Uber also serves cab services for Bangalore City
KSTDC is an organisation that was established by the Government of Karnataka state in India to promote Tourism in Karnataka.
